idea:
ENZUGER and BITMASK Range of Products are consumer products and are Nutraceutical or Medical Nutrition suitable and recommended for Paediatrics to Geriatrics. All the products are FIRST of their kinds. They are backed by in-house research & development capabilities thereby ensuring augmenting the range to make the most out of the market opportunities. There are no insulin free products to provide nutrition to the diabetics across the world today and VEGANUTRITECH LLP shall fill this gap in the world market.

VEGANUTRITECH LLP proposes to offer rights to manufacture and sell to prospective partners in India and other countries. VEGANUTRITECH LLP will provide the technical support to the partners/ organizations on a continuous basis.
name: Veganutritech LLP

idea:
ARCELI, which means 'Gates to Heaven', is based in Uttarakhand, which is 'Heaven on Earth'. Uttarakhand is the only state in India to legally allow cultivation of Industrial Hemp. 


ARCELI is one of Indiaâ€™s first licensed hemp food manufacturer. 

Our vision is to grow, make and sell our own line of hemp products. 


ARCELI's brand Super Hemp includes organic & conventional products like shelled hemp hearts, nutty and flavored hemp seeds, hemp protein powder, organic hemp oil, hemp vitality pills, hemp fiber, hemp plastic & hempcrete.

Arceli under it's own brand will also be manufacturing ayurvedic and herbal proprietary oil blends.
name: ARCELI LIFESCIENCE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Scheduled Castes, who constitute 16.6% of our population as per 2011
Census, have historically suffered social disabilities and educational and economic
deprivation arising out of them. Accordingly, special provisions have been enshrined in
the Constitution for advancement of their interests. These provisions range from
measures to remove any kind of social disabilities imposed on them to ensure equality
of opportunity in every sphere, to measures of positive discrimination to bring them on
par with rest of the population.
name: rt education
